page.title: 16CARVED SLATES
page.content: CARVED SLATES _____________ Carved slates are something that are unique to our area because of the slate quarries.In the old days when the quarrymen were building their tiny cottages they could not afford tiled fireplaces so they took some slate slabs and carved various patterns on them.They designed and even made their own tools.A lot of the designs are geometrical shapes drawn in a pattern,but some are very crude drawings of local scenes.We had an exhibition of these slates in school and the local archeological society have made a catalogue of them.Some houses have the original slate fireplaces still in them.
